projects.name: Whisper Wall
projects.text: This is a fullstack project created of me and my three team mates. It's a platform were you anonymously can post stories, rumors or anecdotes ancored to a specific place. We've used API's for an interactive map, analysing text to maintain a positive tone on the page and translation.

projects.name: Family Fitness
projects.text: Family Fitness is a made up company and a colaboration with a UX-design student. I was given a design in figma and created the frontend of the design as closely as possible within the timeframe I had. It is translated with React i18next and can be read i three different languages

projects.name: Login Page
projects.text: Creating this authentication API as fullstack site for Login. Storing and encrypt passwords in the database.

projects.name: QR-code Generator
projects.text: This QR-code generator is created with advanced hooks as useRef Hook, useReducer Hook and Costum Hooks

projects.name: Movie site
projects.text: This is a pair project where we buildt a movie site, fetching API's and were learning about React Router Dom. It's two pages with responsive design

projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.text: In this fullstackproject, I practiced my React state skills by fetching and posting data to an API while building a Twitter (X)-like project. I have also buildt my own API to this project using MongoDB.

projects.name: Quiz
projects.text: The Quiz is a group project were we worked in branches and working together with live share. We use Zustand in our global state management

projects.name: Survey - Ticket to mars
projects.text: We was practising React state and controlled forms by making a Typeform-like product. It's a pair project and and we build a multi-step form using React Hook useSate.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.text: It's a  simple weather app that provides the current weather using an API

projects.name: Guess Who Game
projects.text: This is a classic game to guess the hidden character
